question: Where is the Indian Institute of Horticultural Research (IIHR) campus located?
explanation:
The five-day National Horticulture Fair has been scheduled to start on February 8 at the Indian Institute of Horticultural Research (IIHR) campus, Bengaluru.
This year, the theme is ‘Horticulture for Start-Up and Stand-Up India’ to encourage farmers to become entrepreneurs. The Fair can also be attended by people across the country virtually.
